Oh hello there, I'm an example guy and I have a quest for you!
node.contextBefore: first reply option should be marked with quest icon here

option.optiontext: Oh really? What kind of a quest?

node.text: A very important quest! You see, once upon a time this place contained a thingy and I've come here to find the thingy.
Once I got here, I found this door. I've found no way to get the door open. Perhaps you can get the door open?
node.contextBefore: 1st reply option would need a tag to update the quest

option.optiontext: I'll see what I can do.
Have you tried opening the door?

node.text: I did, but it wouldn't open!

option.optiontext: I'll see what I can do.

node.text: I'm an example guy and I'm here as an example.

option.optiontext: So what's this quest you mentioned?

Okey, well I have to go.
